bug.author: syan1992
bug.description: I use it on Windows. There isn't a file after I click save. I can't find the 'json' file.

comments.comment: Sorry, I don't have environment to reproduce.
In app.py, line 793, I think it might be as follows, without '[0]' in the end: filename = dlg.getSaveFileName( self, 'Choose File', default_labelfile_name, 'Label files (*%s)' % LabelFile.suffix)

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/syan1992>@syan1992</denchmark-link> Thanks for the report. I released <denchmark-link:https://github.com/wkentaro/labelme/releases/tag/v2.5.2>v2.5.2</denchmark-link>
